mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xuexishipin_id as xuexishipinId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xuexishipin_liuyan_text as xuexishipinLiuyanText ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,xuexishipin.xuexishipin_name as xuexishipinName ,xuexishipin.xuexishipin_photo as xuexishipinPhoto ,xuexishipin.xuexishipin_video as xuexishipinVideo ,xuexishipin.xuexishipin_jiangshi as xuexishipinJiangshi ,xuexishipin.xuexishipin_types as xuexishipinTypes ,xuexishipin.xuexishipin_content as xuexishipinContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM xuexishipin_liuyan a left JOIN xuexishipin xuexishipin ON a.xuexishipin_id = xuexishipin.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.xuexishipin_id = #{params.xuexishipinId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.xuexishipin_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.xuexishipinLiuyanText},'%')
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.xuexishipin_id IS NOT NULL
and xuexishipin.xuexishipin_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xuexishipinName},'%')
and xuexishipin.xuexishipin_video like CONCAT('%',#{params.xuexishipinVideo},'%')
and xuexishipin.xuexishipin_jiangshi like CONCAT('%',#{params.xuexishipinJiangshi},'%')
and xuexishipin.xuexishipin_types = #{params.xuexishipinTypes}
and xuexishipin.xuexishipin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xuexishipinContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
